name: Steven The Cat
description:
Steven is a completely normal cat. Usually enjoying his calm life close to his owner. However, each time he sees that red dot in his house, there is no way to stop him.

The game is developed with love by TerraStudios
Konstantin Milev (Kosio#9955) - Lead Developer / Programming 
Dariusz Zakrzewski (pszczelarz#7599) - Game Design /  Level Design
Mateusz Wojciechowski (FamousAnus#9560) - 2D / UI / Sound
Penca53#1165 - Programming / Sound
Mobster the Lobster#6955 - Programming
Nikos Konstantinou (nikoskon#6100) - Programming

TerraStudios Discord Server: https://discord.gg/F5rnvDu
